options.fig.cap: Figure 1: A figure that deceptively makes two parallel lines of equal length look of unequal length.

options.fig.cap: Figure 2: Illustration of the interpretation of expectiles in terms of centres of balance: the hollow triangles at positions c1 and c2. Here, the vertical dashed line is at the 0.1-expectile, and the solid triangle at ?(?? = 0.1).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-2
